Reading the reviews, it stated this pants ran big. I wear size 34 but my concern was that I'm only 5'4" tall so I wanted to get the shortest length without feeling too tight on the waist area, but still achieve the correct look without being baggy all the way to the ankles. So I went with a Medium (32-34). Turns out I could have gone with a Small seeing how the waist band is VERY stretchy. Possibly even if you normally wear size 36 it would still be comfortable if you needed to go with a Small due to being a shorter frame. Overall, I'm super happy with the purchase. They are very comfortable. I only wish the material was softer like a sweatpants but this is me being very picky.

As someone who appreciates both comfort and style in their wardrobe, I was excited to try out the AITFINEISM Men's Drawstring Aladdin Drop Crotch Pants.  These pants are incredibly comfortable to wear, thanks to their loose and relaxed fit. The drop crotch design allows for plenty of freedom of movement, making them perfect for lounging around the house, running errands, or even practicing yoga. The soft and lightweight fabric feels gentle against the skin, making these pants ideal for all-day wear.  I live in LA, so the light weight material is perfect for warmer days in LA when I am lounging around at home.

I was curious to try-out these drop crotch harem pants because I've never really donned a pair before! They are most definitely spacious but if you've never worn a pair of these, here are some details to be aware of:  - Created out of 100% cotton, they are extremely soft but can sometimes become a bit hot if used for extended periods of time (like nighttime use).  - There is an abundant amount of colors and styles to choose from, so, feel free to showcase your personal style however you like.  - Taking into account how well-crafted these harem pants are, I'd say the price is a more than fair deal!  Although, the drop crotch aesthetic is something that may take some getting use to for those who have not worn them before, I find this product to be utterly relaxing! Highly satisfied customer here for a stand-out apparel choice.

As one would expect, these are very comfortable pants with an elastic and drawstring waist and pockets. The fabric feels like light cotton, linen, or a blend. Even though these are listed for men, I don't care about gender norms and as a woman, wear these around the house because they are so incredibly comfortable. I easily could have gone down a size, maybe 2, but wasn't sure how the sizing would be and wanted to allow for possible shrinking. I've only washed these in cold so far with no shrinkage that I've noticed. It was an odd feeling when I first put these on because it felt like I was wearing pants with no crotch, but mentally registered that this wasn't a skirt. One gets used to that quickly though. I don't think these are worth the current asking price of just under $30, however, and if I weren't part of the Vine program, I would not have ordered them on that alone.

Seriously, these pants are not only super comfy but also effortlessly cool. The drawstring waist makes them easy to adjust for the perfect fit, while the loose drop crotch gives you all the room to move and groove. Whether you're lounging at home, running errands, or hitting up a casual hangout, these pants will have you feeling like a style icon.  The airy loose fitting fabric is perfect for warmer days, and the relaxed vibe is just what you need for laid-back occasions.
